entry.title: KhaledObaidCubes/tree-structure-utils: A lightweight TypeScript utility for creating, managing, and traversing tree data structures. Provides typed interfaces for nodes, helper functions for building hierarchies, and tools for manipulating tree relationships like parent-child links and descendant tracking.
entry.content: A lightweight TypeScript utility for creating, managing, and traversing tree data structures. Provides typed interfaces for nodes, helper functions for building hierarchies, and tools for manipulating tree relationships like parent-child links and descendant tracking.

entry.title: 1landres/psfree-lapse: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.

entry.title: P-Dubey294/Node.js-Express: This is a Node.js-based application built with JavaScript to provide fast, scalable, and efficient backend services. It utilizes an event-driven, non-blocking I/O model, making it lightweight and ideal for real-time applications.
entry.content: This is a Node.js-based application built with JavaScript to provide fast, scalable, and efficient backend services. It utilizes an event-driven, non-blocking I/O model, making it lightweight and ideal for real-time applications.
